page.title: 14Educatin con't
page.content: retained. History,Geography,Science are taught plus art,music,craft,needlework and athletics. Homework is offered occasionaly but is not compulsary . No distinctive uniform is required but the children are requsted to dress neatly. If a child appears to need special educational help the advice of various support services operated by the local educational authority is sought where the school judges this to be nessesary. Various activities are offered,these include games clubs,chess,quizes and musical events such activities are entered into volentary by both by staff and children. School transport is provided to collect and return children to school
